parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  cs.*,
  cf.email,
  cf.nom,
  cf.prenom,
  cf.raison_sociale,
  p.nom_plan,
  p.duree_mois,
  t.tva_rate
FROM client_subscriptions cs
JOIN client_finals cf ON cs.client_final_id = cf.id
JOIN plans p ON cs.plan_id = p.id
LEFT JOIN tenants t ON t.id = $1
WHERE cs.id = $2::uuid
  AND cs.statut = 'actif';

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: false, error: 'Erreur Stripe: abonnement inactif ou non trouvé' }) }}

parameters.query:
=UPDATE client_subscriptions
SET 
  date_prochain_renouvellement = $1::timestamptz,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = $2::uuid
RETURNING *;

=INSERT INTO invoices (
  id,
  tenant_id,
  client_final_id,
  numero_facture,
  date_emission,
  date_echeance,
  montant_ht,
  montant_ttc,
  tva_rate,
  statut,
  description,
  subscription_id,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  gen_random_uuid(),
  $1::uuid,
  $2::uuid,
  'INV-' || TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(FLOOR(RANDOM() * 10000)::TEXT, 4, '0'),
  $3::timestamptz,
  $4::timestamptz,
  $5::numeric,
  $6::numeric,
  $7::numeric,
  'en_attente',
  $8::text,
  $9::uuid,
  NOW()
)
RETURNING *;
